mapper.insert: insert into empty_position (department_id, position_name, position_number, position_salary, position_education_background, position_description, flag) values (#{departmentId}, #{positionName}, #{positionNumber}, #{positionSalary}, #{positionEducationBackground}, #{positionDescription}, 1)
mapper.update: update empty_position set flag = 0 where position_id=#{positionId}
